All Relic Animator Run.NAME: All Relic Animator Run
All Relic Animator Run.DESCRIPTION: All relics for all non-modded characters are unlocked (except for ones that affect non-Animator stances).  Animator only.

No Relics.NAME: No Relics
No Relics.DESCRIPTION: Non-Event, non-Boss relics are replaced with Circlets.  Animator only.

Series Deck.NAME: Series Deck
Series Deck.DESCRIPTION: Starts with 1 copy of each card in your starting series.  Animator only.
